correct_order: With all the limitations and deficiencies inherent in our educational system has to be achieved only through combined effort of teachers and community
A value based approach must form the backbone of educational system and also the teacher education system
Teacher preparation must ensure development of commitment amongst teachers
It is tough proposition when most of the other sectors are influenced by self-interests and material pursuits everywhere
However, teacher education needs to emphasise that teachers alone can kindle the value-based growth.

sources: However, teacher education needs to emphasise that teachers alone can kindle the value-based growth.
It is tough proposition when most of the other sectors are influenced by self-interests and material pursuits everywhere
With all the limitations and deficiencies inherent in our educational system has to be achieved only through combined effort of teachers and community
A value based approach must form the backbone of educational system and also the teacher education system
Teacher preparation must ensure development of commitment amongst teachers
